languages.text: {n}Взгляд Иеронимуса полнится горечью.{/n} "Нет. Не хочу. Мой путь служения Ему всегда отличался от проторенных Экклезиархией дорог. Учение святого Друза учило меня тем добродетелям, что неведомы многим праведникам, а я в свою очередь учил им своих братьев и сестер. Я пытался научить им и Инцендию, но... Но она избрала иной путь. Пора мне вновь напомнить об этих уроках".

{n}Hieronymus's eyes are filled with bitter sadness.{/n} "No. It would not. My way of serving Him has always been different from the paths trodden by the Ecclesiarchy. Saint Drusus's doctrine taught me virtues that are unknown to many among the righteous, and I, in turn, taught them to my brothers and sisters. I tried to teach them to Incendia, too, but... she chose a different path. It is time for me to remind her of those lessons."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Иеронимуса полнится горечью.{/n} "Нет. Не хочу. Мой путь служения Ему всегда отличался от проторенных Экклезиархией дорог. Учение святого Друза учило меня тем добродетелям, что неведомы многим праведникам, а я в свою очередь учил им своих братьев и сестер. Я пытался научить им и Инцендию, но... Но она избрала иной путь. Пора мне вновь напомнить об этих уроках".

Saint Drusus's doctrine taught me virtues that are unknown to many among the righteous, and I in turn taught them to my brothers and sisters. I tried to teach them to Incendia, too, but... she chose a different path. It is time for me to remind her of those lessons."

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯的目光中充满了苦涩的悲伤。{/n}“不，不是这样的。我侍奉神皇的方式，一直都与国教的既定做法不同。在圣德鲁苏斯的教义下，我学会了许多就连那些正义之士都不知道的美德，而我也反过来，将这些美德传授给我的兄弟姐妹们。我也曾试过将这些美德传授给因森蒂娅，可她……她却选择了不同的道路。是时候提醒她那些美德的教诲了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's eyes are filled with bitter sadness.{/n} "No. It would not. My way of serving Him has always been different from the paths trodden by the Ecclesiarchy. Saint Drusus's doctrine taught me virtues that are unknown to many among the righteous, and I, in turn, taught them to my brothers and sisters. I tried to teach them to Incendia, too, but... she chose a different path. It is time for me to remind her of those lessons."

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯的目光中充满了苦涩的悲伤。{/n}“不，不是这样的。我侍奉神皇的方式，一直都与国教的既定做法不同。圣德鲁苏斯的教义教会了我许多就连那些正义之士都不知道的美德，而我也反过来，将这些美德传授给我的兄弟姐妹们。我也曾试过，将这些美德传授给因森蒂娅，可她……她却选择了不同的道路。我是时得提醒她那些美德的教诲了。”

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスの目は、深い悲しみに染まっている。{/n}「いや、それは違う。私の主への奉仕は、帝国聖教会の常軌を逸した手法とは異なっていた。聖ドルススの教義は、多くの義人には知られていない美徳を私に教えてくれた。そして私はそのお返しとして、兄弟や姉妹に伝えたのだ。インセンディアにも教えようとしたが…彼女は別の道を選んだ。今になってようやく彼女に教訓を示す時が来たようだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's eyes are filled with bitter sadness.{/n} "No. It would not. My way of serving Him has always been different from the paths trodden by the Ecclesiarchy. Saint Drusus's doctrine taught me virtues that are unknown to many among the righteous, and I, in turn, taught them to my brothers and sisters. I tried to teach them to Incendia, too, but... she chose a different path. It is time for me to remind her of those lessons."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスの目は、深い悲しみに染まっている。{/n}「いや、それは違う。私の主への奉仕は、帝国聖教会の常軌を逸した手法とは異なっていた。聖ドルススの教義は、多くの義人には知られていない美徳を私に教えてくれた。そして私はそのお返しとして、兄弟や姉妹に伝えたのだ。インセンディアにも教えようとしたが…彼女は別の道を選んだ。今になってようやく彼女に教訓を示す時が来たようだ」

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Hieronymus están llenos de tristeza.{/n} «No. No lo haría. Mi forma de servirle siempre se ha alejado de los caminos de la Eclesiarquía. La doctrina de san Drusus me enseñó virtudes desconocidas para muchos, y a su vez yo se las enseñé a mis hermanos y hermanas. Intenté enseñárselas también a Incendia, pero... ella eligió un camino diferente. Es hora de que le recuerde esas lecciones».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's eyes are filled with bitter sadness.{/n} "No. It would not. My way of serving Him has always been different from the paths trodden by the Ecclesiarchy. Saint Drusus's doctrine taught me virtues that are unknown to many among the righteous, and I, in turn, taught them to my brothers and sisters. I tried to teach them to Incendia, too, but... she chose a different path. It is time for me to remind her of those lessons."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Hieronymus están llenos de tristeza.{/n} «No. No lo haría. Mi forma de servirle siempre se ha alejado de los caminos de la Eclesiarquía. La doctrina de san Drusus me enseñó virtudes desconocidas para muchos, y a su vez yo se las enseñé a mis hermanos y hermanas. Intenté enseñárselas también a Incendia, pero... ella eligió un camino diferente. Es hora de que le recuerde esas lecciones».

languages.text: {n}In Hieronymus' Augen steht bittere Traurigkeit.{/n} "Nein. Das stimmt nicht. Mein Weg, ihm zu dienen, war immer ein anderer als die ausgetretenen Pfade der Ekklesiarchie. Die Doktrin des Heiligen Drusus hat mich Tugenden gelehrt, die vielen unter den Rechtschaffenen unbekannt sind, und ich wiederum habe sie meine Brüder und Schwestern gelehrt. Ich habe versucht, sie auch Incendia zu lehren, doch ... sie hat einen anderen Pfad gewählt. Es wird Zeit, dass ich sie an diese Lektionen erinnere."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's eyes are filled with bitter sadness.{/n} "No. It would not. My way of serving Him has always been different from the paths trodden by the Ecclesiarchy. Saint Drusus's doctrine taught me virtues that are unknown to many among the righteous, and I, in turn, taught them to my brothers and sisters. I tried to teach them to Incendia, too, but... she chose a different path. It is time for me to remind her of those lessons."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Hieronymus' Augen steht bittere Traurigkeit.{/n} "Nein. Das stimmt nicht. Mein Weg, ihm zu dienen, war immer ein anderer als die ausgetretenen Pfade der Ekklesiarchie. Die Doktrin des Heiligen Drusus hat mich Tugenden gelehrt, die vielen unter den Rechtschaffenen unbekannt sind, und ich wiederum habe sie meine Brüder und Schwestern gelehrt. Ich habe versucht, sie auch Incendia zu lehren, doch ... sie hat einen anderen Pfad gewählt. Es wird Zeit, dass ich sie an diese Lektionen erinnere."

languages.text: « Non, {n}répond Hiéronymus, le regard plein d'amertume.{/n} Non, certainement pas. Je me suis toujours évertué à servir l'Empereur du mieux possible, sans toujours suivre le chemin tracé par l'Ecclésiarchie. La doctrine de Saint Drusus m'a enseigné des vertus que beaucoup parmi les justes ignorent, vertus que j'ai pris soin de transmettre à mes frères et sœurs. J'ai tenté de les apprendre à Incendia, mais... elle a choisi une autre voie. Je crois qu'il est temps pour moi de lui rappeler ces leçons. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's eyes are filled with bitter sadness.{/n} "No. It would not. My way of serving Him has always been different from the paths trodden by the Ecclesiarchy. Saint Drusus's doctrine taught me virtues that are unknown to many among the righteous, and I, in turn, taught them to my brothers and sisters. I tried to teach them to Incendia, too, but... she chose a different path. It is time for me to remind her of those lessons."

traits.locale_text: « Non, {n}répond Hiéronymus, le regard plein d'amertume.{/n} Non, certainement pas. Je me suis toujours évertué à servir l'Empereur du mieux possible, sans toujours suivre le chemin tracé par l'Ecclésiarchie. La doctrine de Saint Drusus m'a enseigné des vertus que beaucoup parmi les justes ignorent, vertus que j'ai pris soin de transmettre à mes frères et sœurs. J'ai tenté de les apprendre à Incendia, mais... elle a choisi une autre voie. Je crois qu'il est temps pour moi de lui rappeler ces leçons. »

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus'un gözlerine acı bir hüzün hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Hayır. Hayır, olmaz. Benim O'na hizmet etme biçimim, her daim Ekleşiarşi'nin çizdiği yoldan farklı olmuştur. Aziz Drusus'un öğretisi, bana birçok inançlı kimsenin aşina olmadığı birçok fazilet öğretmiştir. Ben de bu öğretileri kardeşlerime öğretmişimdir. Bunları İncendia'ya da öğretmeye çalıştım ancak o... Farklı bir yol seçti. Ona bu dersleri hatırlatmamın zamanı geldi."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus's eyes are filled with bitter sadness.{/n} "No. It would not. My way of serving Him has always been different from the paths trodden by the Ecclesiarchy. Saint Drusus's doctrine taught me virtues that are unknown to many among the righteous, and I, in turn, taught them to my brothers and sisters. I tried to teach them to Incendia, too, but... she chose a different path. It is time for me to remind her of those lessons."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus'un gözlerine acı bir hüzün hâkim.{/n} "Hayır. Hayır, değil. Benim O'na hizmet etme biçimim her daim Ekleşiarşi'nin çizdiği yoldan farklı olmuştur. Aziz Drusus'un öğretisi, bana birçok inançlı kişinin aşina olmadığı birçok fazilet öğretmiştir ve ben de bu öğretileri kardeşlerime öğretmişimdir. Bunları İncendia'ya da öğretmeye çalıştım ancak o... Farklı bir yol seçti. Ona bu dersleri hatırlatmamın zamanı geldi."
